We will see views of the shady mangrove forest since entering this ecotourism area.
Aesthetic location settings and wooden bridges that are a shame if they are not captured on camera.
Holidays to the¬†Mangrove¬†Mount Anyar Tourism can be done on weekends.
If visiting hours are about to run out, the officer will notify you via loudspeaker.
This tourist spot is open every day from 07.00 to 15.00 WIB. Visitors are asked to maintain cleanliness and facilities during the tour.
Some of the facilities at this tourist spot include a parking area, toilets, prayer room, gazebo, food court and other facilities that can support activities while in the Gunung Anyar Mangrove.
The latest is the MSME showroom which will later sell food and beverages made from mangrove plants, including: mangrove syrup, mangrove chili sauce, etc.
Even though there are still a lot of additional facilities, such as parking lots for 4-wheeled vehicles.
Several photo spots that spoil the eye are also available almost along the route.
Carrying the concept of Ecogreen tourism, it is very comfortable to visit for family tourism or for photo hunting or jogging around the mangrove area.
Generally tourists travel on weekends and sometimes there are also community activities or managers who invite tourists to plant mangroves on certain dates.

Supporting facilities include jogging tracks, trash bins in every corner, clean toilets, prayer room, photo spots, nursery, motorbike and car parking is very wide. In addition, there is also a canteen   cafeteria.
There's nothing wrong with enjoying a holiday and a picnic here. Have a great adventure

You will see a beautiful view of the mangrove forest from the moment you enter the¬†Mangrove¬†Mount Anyar Tourism area. When crossing the bridge, you will be surrounded by lush mangrove trees.
You will also be treated to views of cranes, long-tailed monkeys and sea frogs.
